1.title: YUME
1.description: YUME is a full-stack project created during my semester in Japan. I wanted to develop a web application for couples and friends to get to know each other better through questions and quizzes. For the design, I wanted to create a calm atmosphere with pastel colors.

2.title: Cartography of cemetery Père Lachaise
2.description: The aim of this project is to give the Père Lachaise cemetery a new identity, inspired by the Pop Art movement, with a colourful and fun visual identity.

3.title: Badminton Event
3.description: Design of a poster for an event organised by my Badminton club. Made on Figma.
